articles.author: Gregory Korte
articles.title: Ramaswamy Will Use DOGE as Springboard to Run for Ohio Governor - Bloomberg
articles.description: Vivek Ramaswamy, the former presidential candidate and biotech entrepreneur partnering with Elon Musk on a project to slash the size of the federal government, plans to announce a 2026 campaign for Ohio governor, according to a campaign operative familiar wit…

articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: Two lunar landers are on the way to the Moon after SpaceX’s double moonshot - Ars Technica
articles.description: The landers were developed by Texas-based Firefly Aerospace and a Japanese startup named ispace.
